text: Halvor Næs (born 19 April 1928) is a Norwegian former ski jumper. He competed in the 1950s. His only victory was in 1953 and he finished fifth in the individual large hill event at the 1952 Winter Olympics in Oslo.Holmenkollen medalists - click Holmenkollmedaljen for downloadable pdf file He was born in Trysil. Næs was awarded the Holmenkollen medal in 1964 (shared with Veikko Kankkonen, Eero Mäntyranta, and Georg Thoma). ==References== Category:1928 births Category:Living people Category:Norwegian skiers Category:Olympians for Norway
title: Halvor Næs
